patthana24.1:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana24.1:0.3_0: There are causes and reasons for this.
patthana24.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana24.1:10.1_0: No cause or reason for the sake of cause or reason.
patthana24.1:11.1_0: for the sake of what is the basis for ending ...
patthana24.1:2.1_0: No cause is a reason for the sake of cause.
patthana24.1:2.1_1: Not because of cause or reason, the reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason for the sake of cause and reason.
patthana24.1:2.1_2: Not for the sake of a cause and reason for the sake of cause and reason.
patthana24.1:3.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of causes and conditions.
patthana24.1:5.1_0: There is no cause or reason for the sake of listening to the teaching.
patthana24.1:6.1_0: For one converses on the basis for six days: three ... six ... six ...
patthana24.1:6.1_1: blow, the four supports, and five things have been given to one another.
patthana24.1:7.1_0: (The following should be expanded: in detail as in the section.)
patthana24.1:8.1_0: No cause is the reason for the sake of cause or condition that gives rise to diversity of causes.
patthana24.1:9.1_0: Not knowing and seeing the cause or condition for the sake of causes and conditions.
